name: Helix Bouncing Mania
description:
Enjoy Playing Helix - Stack Ball Game? 'Helix Bouncing Mania' is the best Stack Ball game, full 3d, in the best tradition of fast-paced arcade games.

Bounce on and destroy wheeling platforms stacked in rotating spirals to complete levels.

Hit Colored plates to destroy them and descend your ball. But bouncing on a black plate means Game Over! Your rolling ball breaks into pieces and you have to start your fall all over again. Luckily you restart at the same level and there are over 100 levels to complete.

Taping on the screen gets the stack ball becomes an high-energy fireball. This allows this super- ball  to fail in the diffent colored ring plateforms. Drop on the correct color wheel, so that it locks all these wheels and complete level. Sounds easy? Simple gameplay but jumping on the right stacks asks for dexterity!

You can choose to play at full speed at your own risks and benefits or go carefully waiting for best opportunity to fall down.

Things that makes for this game a great gameplay :
- Easy Controls
- Amazing speed
- Bright graphics
- 3D Animations
- Easy to play, tough to master
- Great casual game
- Over 100 levels

Enjoy!
